text: @realDonaldTrump Yes, @realDonaldTrump, #covid19 is no big deal when you’re a young, healthy protestor - and if you’re referring to Chaz, they’ve effective self isolated as a group, so they’ll all have antibodies by the end of the summer when it starts raining and they go back to normal life ;)

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
